session.goal: Add progress bars to Dev Intelligence Dashboard cards + fix GitHub API issues

changes.summary: Added progress bars to each project card in the Dev Intelligence Dashboard. Parses [x]/[ ] checklist items from MILESTONES.md for granular task-level progress. Falls back to milestone phase completion counts when no checklists found. Color-coded bar: red (<40%), amber (40-70%), blue (70-99%), green (100%). Also fixed GitHub API auth (swapped fine-grained PAT for gh OAuth token), base64 newline decoding, docs/ file paths, Promise.allSettled resilience, and flexible milestone parser for both table and heading+checklist formats.

decisions_made: Parse [x]/[ ] checkboxes from full MILESTONES.md for granular progress (not just phase counts)
Fall back to milestone phase status counts when no checklists found
Color-coded progress bar: red <40%, amber 40-70%, blue 70-99%, green 100%
Progress bar hidden when total=0 (no milestones data)
Used gh CLI OAuth token instead of fine-grained PAT for repo access
Flexible milestone parser: table format + heading+checklist format
